S

ScoreCard - Class in model
ScoreCard keeps track of results of previous games.
ScoreCard() - Constructor for class model.ScoreCard
If no path is given ScoreCard uses a hard-written default path.
ScoreCard(String) - Constructor for class model.ScoreCard
The path variable indicates where the serialized score object should be saved and retrieved.
ScoreSubScene - Class in view
The ScoreSubScene is a view for the ScoreCard Object.
ScoreSubScene() - Constructor for class view.ScoreSubScene
The ScoreCard view is instantiated with "no scores found", if it is not updated, that is what will be displayed.
setChosen(boolean) - Method in class view.SnapCheckBox
Sets the checkbox as chosen or not, and updates the image accordingly.
setDeck(Deck) - Method in class model.Player
Sets the player's personal deck to the given Deck object.
setLastCard(Card) - Method in class model.Deck
Sets the second last turned card.
setLastCard(Card) - Method in class model.Game
Sets the second last turned card of the communal pile to the given Card object.
setToFont(Text, int) - Method in class view.SnapSubScene
Tries to set to default font, if font is not found, sets text to Verdana.
setTopCard(Card) - Method in class model.Deck
Sets the last turned card
setTopCard(Card) - Method in class model.Game
Sets the last turned card of the communal pile to the given Card object.
show() - Method in class view.GameView
Show the game stage.
showCard(int, boolean) - Static method in class view.CardView
 
showDisplay(int) - Method in class view.PlayerView
If the number of cards has changed, the display is updated and returned, otherwise it is simply returned.
showLastCard(int) - Method in class view.GameView
Shows the card image with the given value in the compare (left) position
showSnapResult(int, boolean) - Method in class view.GameView
Show visual indicating whether attempted snap was successful or not.
showSnapResult(int, boolean) - Method in class view.SnapActionView
If snap is successful shows success image, else failure image.
showSubScene(SnapSubScene) - Method in class view.MenuView
This function moves a subscene out of view before moving a new subscene into view.
showTopCard(int) - Method in class view.GameView
Shows the card image with the given value in the non-compare (right) position
showTurn(int) - Method in class view.GameView
Shows text indicating it's the turn of the player with the given id number.
shuffle() - Method in class model.Deck
Shuffles the order of cards in deck randomly.
snap(Player) - Method in class model.Game
Checks if the snap provoked by Player p is valid.
SnapActionView - Class in view
This view displays the results of a snap action.
SnapActionView() - Constructor for class view.SnapActionView
 
SnapButton - Class in view
A customized button to be used throughout subscenes.
SnapButton(String) - Constructor for class view.SnapButton
If width and height are not specified, uses default values.
SnapButton(String, int, int) - Constructor for class view.SnapButton
If width and height are given, default values are ignored.
SnapCheckBox - Class in view
A number/check box pair to be used to gather user input.
SnapCheckBox(int) - Constructor for class view.SnapCheckBox
The checkbox will display about it the indicated number.
SnapSubScene - Class in view
Abstract subscene class, with basic aesthetics and functionality for all subscenes.
SnapSubScene() - Constructor for class view.SnapSubScene
height, width, and background image are predefined for all subscenes, and set in the constructor.
splitDeck(int) - Method in class model.Deck
This splits the current deck into n equal parts.
start(Stage) - Method in class controller.Main
Starts the application
StartSubScene - Class in view
This class contains the visual elements for selecting player numbers and deck numbers, and also the button to launch the game play view.
StartSubScene() - Constructor for class view.StartSubScene
